goal: Create @graffio/keymap module for keyboard-driven interaction with priority-based resolution

steps.action: Create modules/keymap directory structure and package.json
Move intent.type.js and keymap.type.js from design-system to keymap module
Update type-mappings.js in cli-type-generator for new paths
Run yarn types:generate to create src/types/ in keymap module
Move keymap.js (normalizeKey, resolveKey, collectAvailableKeybindings) to keymap module
Create src/index.js exporting types and functions
Move tests from design-system to keymap module
Run tests, fix any import issues
Remove keymap code from design-system (keymaps/, type-definitions)
Add global keydown listener and active tracking in router.jsx
Register keymap in TransactionRegisterPage with Move down/up, Delete item
Manual test: j/k navigate, Delete triggers handler, typing in search works
git add and commit: 'Integrate keymap system in quicken-web-app'

verification: All tests pass in keymap module
Typing in search field works normally
Multiple DataTables: only active one responds
deferred: Remove baked-in keyboard handling from DataTable
